title: On Questions
summary: My collection of notes of "questions" topic

body.raw:
<aside>
üí° ‚Äú‚Üí‚Äù read as ‚Äúcan leads to‚Äù

</aside>

- Questions can be used as direct manipulation to shape our understanding
- Quality of questions ‚Üí quality answer ‚Üí quality of information ‚Üí quality of understanding

["The Hidden Power of Questions | Steven Ilous | TEDxCulverCitySalon](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XPLZmEg0Zto)

- Question can be seen as process of of connecting the dots, the answer of the questions is the connections between the dots, in some sense
